1115696504126103552.text: ProjectxChange was one of the highlights of our conference. We would like to share our thanks with all participants and congratulate our winners: @GetGitcoin, @Civil, and @bunzofficial!https://radicalxchange.org/blog/posts/2019-04-09-e45kc9/ …

1109939844799696896.text: The end of our first conference is just the beginning of our movement. Reach out to us at info@radicalxchange.org to get involved in building a brighter and more prosperous future!

1113486431635116032.text: We'd like to thank @DunyaLabs for their support of the RadicalxChange conference! More conference highlights and photos to be released soon!

1116423824017379329.text: We'd like to thank @OmidyarNetwork for sharing our vision and supporting our inaugural conference! More conference summaries and highlights to be released soon!

1116764999798513665.text: We'd like to thank @INETeconomics for supporting our conference, allowing us to develop ideas for updated institutions to respond to modern challenges.

1116740953568473088.text: A shout out to #DataasLabor in the Washington Examiner!https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/opinion/op-eds/if-democrats-dont-get-optimistic-about-automation-theyll-lose-2020?fbclid=IwAR13UV-kQP8Qo1BLrlbiGHzc86o3623O24yHw2vuf4-OFJ2VOVhmPrBugmU …

1117848479957565440.text: Boots Riley's participation was a real treat for all the conference organizers. We would like to thank Evil Twin Booking for their support in bringing such a renowned artist and activist into our community!

1115665011718926336.text: Many of the presenters at RadicalxChange work on data dignity projects at @MSFTResearch. We'd like to thank @Microsoft for supporting our first conference and helping us build a space for this invaluable conversation.

1122892111387353088.text: Fascinating applications of Quadratic Voting in Taiwan!https://yns.page.link/SrnxU

1114160703651233792.text: We’d like to thank @TotleCrypto for their support of #RadicalxChange’s first conference. We hope they and everyone else who attended had a truly unforgettable experience!

1113932978659438592.text:
.@PowerDada reports back on their experience at @RadxChange, which included a live decentralized drawing and milestone auction for the community. Read their guest post for more!

1115443928248016896.text: I'll be presenting my work with @sabinebertram_ on #DataOwnership in a trustless system at the @RadxChange @RxCBoston meetup on 24 April. This project has been long in the works and I am super excited to talk about #DigitalPropertyRights using #NautilusProtocol #ProofOfPrivacy https://twitter.com/RxCBoston/status/1115433511580839937 …

1115433944089079808.text: May 1st, @UBIpromoter will introduce us to @brightID and his plans to change the world with universal basic income.http://bit.ly/2Z04kmL

1116925080582234113.text: Nice piece in @forbes by @lwintermeyer on @bunzofficial, @radxchange and the growing #DataAsLabor economy:https://www.forbes.com/sites/lawrencewintermeyer/2019/04/12/bunz-pays-users-for-their-personal-data-google-and-facebook-be-warned-this-is-the-future/ …

1118521860642177025.text: Talking @RadxChange in Nairobi for Easter break and it just reinforces for me that having conversations about data as labor, democratic governance design, public good provision and ending capitalism is if anything more vital in postcolonial countries than in the West.

1115431376579387392.text: We are excited to announce our spring schedule of meetups! Join us on Wednesdays through April and May as we dive into #RadicalMarkets, continue exploring ideas from @RadxChange (along with some brand new concepts), and work towards a better society.http://bit.ly/2Z2k6O3

1112100599695323136.text: People have been asking me what I mean by "feature ubiquity" since my talk at @RadxChange -  What I mean is that features are not differentiators anymore, they are ubiquitous. Here is why I say that...

1115349816110874624.text:
Last week, #SaoPaulo was lit up with the presence of @glenweyl in a series of events to discuss #RadicalMarkets. If you're Brazilian and interested to experiment with the ideas on the book (or learn more), join the link, next tweet
